jadex.tutorial
Agent TranslationF3

jadex.tutorial.TranslationF3
  • jadex.planlib.DF
  • jadex.tutorial.TranslationD1
    • agent TranslationF3
    contains jadex.planlib.DF, TranslationD1

    TranslationAgent: Lesson F3.

    Using the DF to register a service.

    Explanation

    This example shows how an agent description can be registered at a directory facilitator (DF).

    Goal Summary
    maintaingoalref df_keep_registered
               Make the keep registered goal available.
     
    Configuration Summary
    default configuration  default

    , leasetime=20000
